# firewalla-msp_alarms (Data Source)

Data source for fetching Firewalla traffic Alarms

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Example usage to generate a Target List from Abnormal Upload based Alarms

data "firewalla-msp_boxes" "boxes" {
  filter_group = ""
}

locals {
  boxes = { for box in data.firewalla-msp_boxes.boxes.boxes : box.gid => box }
}

data "firewalla-msp_alarms" "abnormal_upload_list" {
  pages = 2
  query = "type:2 box.name:Firewalla" # Type 2 -> Abnormal Upload
}

locals {
  upload_blocklist = toset([ for alarm in data.firewalla-msp_alarms.abnormal_upload_list.alarms : alarm.remote.domain if alarm.remote.domain != "" ])
}

resource "firewalla-msp_targetlist" "abnormal_upload_list" {
  for_each = local.boxes
  name = "abnormal_upload_blocklist"
  owner = each.value.gid
  note = "Abnormal Upload blocklist"
  list = local.upload_blocklist
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `group_by` (String) Grouping the alarms based on the given values. A comma-separated list. e.g., domain,box
- `limit` (Number) Max number of results being returned. Defaults to 200
- `pages` (Number) Number of pages to combine.
- `query` (String) Filter Alarms by query
- `sort_by` (String) Sorting the alarms based on the given values. A comma-separated list.

### Read-Only

- `alarms` (Attributes List) List of Alarms (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--alarms))

Read-Only:

- `aid` (Number)
- `data_plan` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--alarms--data_plan))
- `device` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--alarms--device))
- `direction` (String)
- `gid` (String)
- `message` (String)
- `port` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--alarms--port))
- `protocol` (String)
- `remote` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--alarms--remote))
- `status` (Number)
- `transfer` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--alarms--transfer))
- `ts` (Number)
- `type` (Number)
